description.zh-cn: 越南共产党、越南民主共和国和越南社会主义共和国的主要缔造者和领导人之一，印度支那共产党的早期创始人之一。曾任越南劳动党中央委员会第一书记和越南共产党中央委员会总书记。
description.en: One of the main founders and leaders of the Communist Party of Vietnam, the Democratic Republic of Vietnam, and the Socialist Republic of Vietnam, and one of the early founders of the Indochinese Communist Party. He served as the First Secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Vietnam and the General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 越南共产主义革命家，曾任越南劳动党主席，是越南民主共和国的创始人和第一任主席。
description.en: A Vietnamese Communist revolutionary who served as Chairman of the Workers' Party of Vietnam and was the founder and first President of the Democratic Republic of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 越南共产党领导人，黎笋的继任者，曾任越南共产党中央委员会总书记。
description.en: A leader of the Communist Party of Vietnam and successor to Lê Duẩn, who served as General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 黎笋的第一任妻子。
description.en: The first wife of Lê Duẩn.

description.zh-cn: 黎笋的第二任妻子。
description.en: The second wife of Lê Duẩn.

description.zh-cn: 黎笋与黎氏霜之子，曾任越南人民军上校。
description.en: Son of Lê Duẩn and Lê Thị Sương, a former colonel in the Vietnam People's Army.

description.zh-cn: 越南社会主义共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 越南共产党的前身，1976年改名为越南共产党。
description.en: The predecessor of the Communist Party of Vietnam, renamed in 1976.

description.zh-cn: 即北越，是越南统一前的社会主义国家。
description.en: Also known as North Vietnam, it was the socialist state before the reunification of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 1976年越南统一后成立的国家。
description.en: The state established after the reunification of Vietnam in 1976.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪在法属印度支那活动的共产主义政党。
description.en: A communist party that was active in French Indochina in the 20th century.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪20年代越南的共产主义青年组织。
description.en: A communist youth organization in Vietnam in the 1920s.

zh-cn: 越南共产党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam

description.zh-cn: 越南共产党的中央领导机构。
description.en: The central leading body of the Communist Party of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪的社会主义联邦制国家。
description.en: A socialist federal state in the 20th century.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia.

description.zh-cn: 越南社会主义共和国与民主柬埔寨之间的一场武装冲突。
description.en: An armed conflict between the Socialist Republic of Vietnam and Democratic Kampuchea.

description.zh-cn: 黎笋在越南国内发动的排斥和迫害华人的运动。
description.en: A movement initiated by Lê Duẩn in Vietnam to exclude and persecute ethnic Chinese.

description.zh-cn: 法国在东南亚的殖民地，包括现今的越南、老挝和柬埔寨。
description.en: A French colony in Southeast Asia, comprising modern-day Vietnam, Laos, and Cambodia.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲国家，在20世纪对越南进行殖民统治。
description.en: A European country that colonized Vietnam in the 20th century.

description.zh-cn: 黎氏霜是黎笋的第一任妻子。
description.en: Lê Thị Sương was the first wife of Lê Duẩn.

description.zh-cn: 阮瑞娥是黎笋的第二任妻子。
description.en: Nguyễn Thụy Nga was the second wife of Lê Duẩn.

description.zh-cn: 黎汗是黎笋的儿子。
description.en: Lê Hãn is the son of Lê Duẩn.

description.zh-cn: 黎汗是黎氏霜的儿子。
description.en: Lê Hãn is the son of Lê Thị Sương.

description.zh-cn: 黎笋出生于越南广治省肇丰县。
description.en: Lê Duẩn was born in Triệu Phong District, Quảng Trị Province, Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 黎笋是印度支那共产党成立时的首批党员之一。
description.en: Lê Duẩn was one of the first members when the Indochinese Communist Party was founded.

description.zh-cn: 黎笋是印度支那共产党的早期创始人之一。
description.en: Lê Duẩn was one of the early founders of the Indochinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 1931年被法国殖民当局逮捕，1936年获释。1940年再次被捕。
description.en: Arrested by French colonial authorities in 1931 and released in 1936. Arrested again in 1940.

relationships.target: 越南劳动党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 在胡志明担任越南劳动党中央委员会主席期间，黎笋作为第一书记，是党内的二号领导人。
description.en: While Ho Chi Minh was Chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Vietnam, Lê Duẩn, as First Secretary, was the party's second-in-command.

description.zh-cn: 黎笋接替胡志明出任越南劳动党中央委员会第一书记。
description.en: Lê Duẩn succeeded Ho Chi Minh as the First Secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 1976年12月，越南劳动党改名为越南共产党。
description.en: In December 1976, the Workers' Party of Vietnam was renamed the Communist Party of Vietnam.

relationships.target: 越南共产党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 长征接替黎笋出任越南共产党中央委员会总书记。
description.en: Trường Chinh succeeded Lê Duẩn as the General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 黎笋下令入侵柬埔寨。
description.en: Lê Duẩn ordered the invasion of Cambodia.

description.zh-cn: 黎笋采取亲近苏联的立场，并在苏联的支持下领导越南。
description.en: Lê Duẩn adopted a pro-Soviet stance and led Vietnam with the support of the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 黎笋在位期间，由于其亲苏立场、否认中国对南海诸岛的主权以及发动排华运动，与中国的关系十分紧张。
description.en: During Lê Duẩn's time in power, relations with China were very tense due to his pro-Soviet stance, his denial of China's sovereignty over the South China Sea islands, and the launch of an anti-Chinese movement.

description.zh-cn: 黎笋在越南国内发动了排华运动。
description.en: Lê Duẩn launched an anti-Chinese movement within Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 黎笋是越南民主共和国的主要缔造者和领导人之一。
description.en: Lê Duẩn was one of the main founders and leaders of the Democratic Republic of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 黎笋是越南社会主义共和国的主要缔造者和领导人之一。
description.en: Lê Duẩn was one of the main founders and leaders of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam.
